item.title: PlayStation Plus Free Games For January 2026 Revealed
item.content:encoded:
GameSpot may receive revenue from affiliate and advertising partnerships for sharing this content and from purchases through links.

PlayStation has revealed this month's batch of free games for PlayStation Plus subscribers. All PS Plus members will be able to claim Need For Speed Unbound, Disney Epic Mickey: Rebrushed, and Core Keeper starting January 6 and they will remain available until Monday, February 2.

If you haven't claimed December's PlayStation Plus free games yet, make sure to do so before Monday, January 5. December's games include Lego Horizon Adventures, Killing Floor 3, The Outlast Trials, Synduality Echo of Ada, and Neon White.

More to come...

Got a news tip or want to contact us directly? Email news@gamespot.com
